name: Battery Buddies
description:
BATTERY BUDDIES

Two long abandoned robots finally stumble across a singular battery. With only one energy source to share between them, they slowly begin their search for a second source.  Help them share the battery and overcome obstacles to truly reunite the pair once more.

CONTROLS

- Left mouse click to skip through cutscenes

- A/D to move

- Spacebar to jump

- Left mouse click + drag to aim. Release left mouse to throw battery

- E to pull back battery

- R to restart

- Esc to quit (on Windows build only)
